prompt_text:

1. 'heath outdoor products' which sells 'accessories'
2. 'signature' which sells 'sewing and accessories'
3. 'smashbox' which sells 'makeup'
4. 'fruit of the loom' which sells 'pants'
5. 'widgeon' which sells 'jackets & coats'
response_text:
The Ferrara Law Group, P.C., a Professional Services company, has previously purchased accessories from Heath Outdoor Products. 

The Ferrara Law Group, P.C., a Professional Services company, has previously purchased sewing and accessories from Signature. 

The Ferrara Law Group, P.C., a Professional Services company, has previously purchased makeup from Smashbox. 

The Ferrara Law Group, P.C., a Professional Services company, has previously purchased pants from Fruit of the Loom. 

The Ferrara Law Group, P.C., a Professional Services company, has previously purchased jackets & coats from Widgeon.
